verses.roman:
sārvabhauma-rāmānanda-vāṇīnāthe diyā
prasāda pāṭhā'la rājā bahuta kariyā

synonyms: sārvabhauma—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; rāmānanda—Rāmānanda Rāya; vāṇīnāthe diyā—through Vāṇīnātha Rāya; prasāda—prasāda; pāṭhā'la—had sent; rājā—the King; bahuta kariyā—in a large quantity.
translation: The King also sent a large quantity of prasāda through Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya, Rāmānanda Rāya and Vāṇīnātha Rāya.
